ModDefinition.name: NoWorld NoiR - Krilalaris (Pajamas)
ModDefinition.description: NoiR from the music unit NoWorld is now in 100% Orange Juice! This replaces Krilalaris (Pajamas) with NoiR (+Haizumi the teddy bear, tissue box, and manager)! Supports all base colour outfits.
ModDefinition.author: Shrike [ShrikeGames.com]
